name: Alcohol Rehabilitation
short_description: 12 Palms Recovery Center is an alcohol rehabilitation center that has a caring staff of professionals  who are trained and medically certified to assist each client through the detox process. 12 Palms staff members are in place twenty fours a day, seven days per week to ensure that each client who is going though detox receives the proper level of care necessary to avoid extreme pain and suffering.  http://www.12palmsrecoverycenter.com/blog/Alcohol-Rehabilitation:-Getting-Over-the-Fear-of-Detox/like26
summary: Alcohol Rehabilitation: Getting Over the Fear of Detox
